title: Social Media Copywriter & Keyword Research Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a detail-oriented and creative Social Media Copywriter & Keyword Research Specialist to support our marketing team by crafting compelling social media captions, sourcing effective hashtags, and conducting keyword research across multiple platforms.

No editing or design work required — just strong, optimized writing and research.

What You’ll Do:
- Write clear, concise, and engaging captions for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, and other platforms

- Research and apply relevant hashtags to maximize reach and engagement

- Conduct SEO-focused keyword research for content visibility and tagging

- Adapt tone and language to fit various brand voices and audience segments

- Stay current with trends, best practices, and algorithm changes on social media platforms

Requirements:
Experience writing short-form copy for social media (portfolio or samples required)

Familiarity with hashtag research tools and keyword tools.

Excellent grammar, spelling, and attention to detail

Able to work with deadlines and handle multiple projects at once

Bonus: Understanding of analytics/engagement metrics to refine content strategies
